name: Kevin Lyttle
description: '''Lescott Kevin Lyttle Coombs''' (born 14 September 1976) is a [[Saint Vincent and the Grenadines|Vincentian]] [[soca music|soca]] singer. He is best known for his 2003 [[hit record|hit]] single "[[Turn Me On (Kevin Lyttle song)|Turn Me On]]," which peaked at number four on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]].
